/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The trees, with their lush green foliage, add a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the gray and white of the buildings.
